title: Translate to selected language on a per-site basis?
content:
I miss being able to chose which language to translate to on a per-site basis AND the browser remember that setting. If you want to permanently translate to a specific language you have to change the preferred display language for all websites as I understand it. Actually it would suffice to be able to set a standard language to translate to, but independent of the preferred display language.

I know Firefox Translate is still Beta so perhaps this important enhancement is in the pipeline?
creator: perallner

title: Why there are 2 diffebrent sets of saved bookmarks of Firefox and pop-up 2 Firefox web-page for immediate use?

title: Al salir de la pantalla completa, entra al modo restaurar abajo
content: Soy usuario de linux y suelo usar el navegador en modo pantalla completa, mas que todo para ver videos de youtube, y cuando suelo trabajar, pero este a tenido un problema desde siempre, por lo menos en mi caso porque se que a otros no les pasa lo mismo, y es que cuando salgo de la pantalla completa, este no queda ajustada a la pantalla (maximizada), sino que queda como una ventana desplegada.
creator: olivercampos29082

title: Mozilla Firefox fica sem som/mudo automaticamente sempre que abro qualquer outro app no desktop
content:
Eu uso WINDOWS 10 e estou tendo o problema do ""firefox ficando sem som toda vez que aciono algum outro app no computador"" ou alguma outra mídia com som. Esse problema até é reversível: basta ir em Configurações de som/Volume do app e preferências do dispositivo e tirar o firefox do "mudo". No entanto, esse problema persiste, e continua ocorrendo, tornando-se necessário reverter isso toda a vez que abro algum outro app no computador.

Talvez o problema seja com configurações/atualizações do windows mais recente, mas de qualquer forma, só estou tendo esse problema com o firefox.
creator: alestentzler

title: How can i recover container Sync and Login Details
content: Please help me recover container login and sync I use about 15 container, each containing logins and important data. Recently i thought of installing firefox on to my very old laptop. However after installing and login, few hours later i got know that my main machine's firfox containers are reset to default. Quite few containers are missing and none of them contain login or anything. Some of container contained emails which are important but i don't recall their login so recovering is very though. Yes i haven't store password login anywhere only if i can no name i can recover. Those email contain very important work data, Please help recover those container along with logins.
